organisation_name: European Conference of Transport Research Institutes (ECTRI)
section: VI - Organisations representing local, regional and municipal authorities, other public or mixed entities, etc.

ERTRAC - European Road Research Advisory Council

goals__remit:
The European Conference of Transport Research Institutes (ECTRI) is an international non‐profit association officially founded in April 2003. It is the first attempt to unite the forces of the foremost multimodal transport research centres across Europe and to thereby promote the excellence of European transport research. 
Today, it includes 27 major transport research institutes or universities from 20 European countries. Together, they account for more than 4,000 European scientific and research staff in the field of transport. ECTRI, as the leading European research association for sustainable and multimodal mobility, is committed to provide the scientifically based competence, knowledge and advice to move towards a green, safe, efficient, and inclusive transport for people and goods.
